storyInfo: The goblet is a black stone left by a certain someone. Under his arrangement, Sui-Xiang descends. The three sisters must concert themselves, and prevail over their self. In another realm of fantasy, everyone pulls together to battle with the celestial. Only clarity that one is oneself, achieved through emotion, can allow one to be free.

attributes.content: What's going on? Is it thundering?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: It looks like it's storming in the mountains. What's been happening with the weather recently...
attributes.name: Street Passerby

attributes.content: Hm? Is there something above there...?
attributes.name: Street Passerby

attributes.content: Huh? Can anyone tell what that is?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: We've been stuck in here for two or three days now.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: If we still can't find a way out, maybe that means...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Quiet.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Hahah... perhaps someday a good mood will strike Dusk on the outside, and she'll let us all out.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: That said, where might that pole-carrier sir be?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: His son's buried in the mountains. He doesn't want to run in with us in a place like this.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I've heard tell of the grievances between you two... but, erm... must you settle matters by such means?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: What else?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I just feel that...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Don't bother feeling about it.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Bystanders always think they understand it all, but people's empathy always turns out to have limits.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I know in my heart what the right thing to do is, what's 'necessary' and what's 'unnecessary.' It's common sense. Anyone would know.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: But sometimes, our feelings won't listen to sense.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: It's raining?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: *Sigh* Well, it's not as if just waiting around like this poses much problem.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Gkh...
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Why don't you all give raising an Ink Spirit a try? I've discovered that if you just grant these things a level mind and calm approach, they're actually quite affectionate...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Gkh...?
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: This goes to show the Sui Regulator had reason to beware her.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Alright, alright, there's not much to gain from quarrelling over them in here... how about we head inside, away from the rain?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Strange how it can rain in here, too.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Truly strange how what falls isn't even ink.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Mr. Taihe? Won't you come in?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: What of Master Shen?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: What's the Master up to? It's been a moment now, but he's still fixated on his palms...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Are you watching the rain?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: According to Nothing, this whole world is just her scroll. Artwork all around, vivid and lifelike.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: At sunrise, fowls fly from the steep forests, mist covers the land. You see sunlight without the sun itself, reflections of thousands of floors, and all is silent.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: If this is a painting, then who knows just what this artist has seen within Yan's scenery...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: How refined, Rainmaster.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I only know that Rainmaster of Duckweeds Shen Lou once served ten years in the army. Who knew he was so versed in literature?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*. I've just been around for a while.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: The only shame is that rain in spring shouldn't be so warm.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Go. Part this open.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Wh-Where are we?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Very wise, Rainmaster.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I did it without thinking.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Shang Zhong.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Was this the reason you all fought over the goblet?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: The clouds roll above the mountains. What's happening over there?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: (Wordless roar)
attributes.name: 'Sui-Xiang'

attributes.content: Ugh, I'm getting a little twitchy now.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Oh... more resilient than the Sui-Xiang I met alone, it seems.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Mere lofty posture. It possesses Its form, but ultimately, has not Its spirit.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: We're still here. What 'spirit' is it going to have?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: It probably used a similar method to that goblet, but for completely opposite effect, so it got a little of the shape. That's all.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Form but no spirit. In the end, it's just a—
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: (Wordless roar)
attributes.name: 'Sui-Xiang'

attributes.content: Hey, look at that. You're pretty scared, aren't you.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Wh-What did you say?!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You know, I feel like you've been digging at me with that 'form but no spirit' stuff.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's been contained with this pavilion for the time being, but if it's disturbed any further... things will be tough.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: What a pain. This sure isn't the kind of thing you throw a firecracker at.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Phew... haah.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Hm? Aren't you going to keep at it?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You really don't like lifting a finger!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: (Wordless roar)
attributes.name: 'Sui-Xiang'

attributes.content: Ah... so this is what scared you.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: O little Dusk.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Don't call me that!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I see you even shiver so. Are you fine?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: My li'l sister here hid in a scroll for a century without closing her eyes, all because she was so scared of this shadow of us here. Makes sense she's got stage fright now.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Don't you make such light of it...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Even if it's just a reflection...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: To be precise, it's us three's reflections, and a quarter of it's Sui's.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But It's us.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: What are we going to...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: (Ridiculing laughter)
attributes.name: 'Sui-Xiang'

attributes.content: Grrrr. Rummaging through my paintings. Are you mocking me?!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Uh, I'm gonna suggest to you right now to rein your imagination in. This thing already forged up my seventh weapon concept without me even thinking it...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Just take a deep breath, okay? Save us from getting slammed inside one of your paintings next—
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: —Paintings?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You have noticed?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The way is natural, and the foundations simple.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Sui was never of such fanciful tricks. In the end, this great Correspondence before Us, Sui-Xiang, is no more than the most unrealistic colors in our deepest selves.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Yea... Sui is but the Years of months drawn out long, and change has been vast. It is on the brink of madness.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: It's already mad.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Right now, at this moment, we're just one of Its dreams.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: When It wakes, we'll all be done for. We won't just be done for, Yan will suffer for it too.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Ling!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: O little Nian, is that why you wish to resist It?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Then you surely have quite the sophisticated plan.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: That part I can't guarantee. I can only say this beats sitting around waiting for it.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Because I don't accept this.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I really don't.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: And you?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: She just dragged me here, that's all... and maybe I have the slightest bit of expectation.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Shut it.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I asked after you just now, as to our collective exit, and your reply to me was that you 'don't know.'
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: This answer truly is not a fine one.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Look now. You are still you, with your own ideas, your own emotional ranges, your own adorations, your own fancied persons, your own fond sceneries...
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: To live in this land is quite fine, is it not?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Whatever It may do.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Don't we have any responsibility for It?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: —I am me. Why should I have much ado about It?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Myriad years the human realm was drunk, and it won't permit me one farcical dream?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: So your answer is?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: —'I mind not.'
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Lift your head and drink.
Tail as a brush, ink as a shadow.
Let wind rise, brilliant in sharp anonymity.
Let rain fall, tassels soaked within.
And thus let the might of wine cleanse my heart.
A board game? What game? I'm not too educated in the whole Art of the Piece.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Weiqi, the Go of Yan.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Now that's too complicated.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What say you, then?
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: How about that five-in-a-row one?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A child's game.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Quite fine enough for me. You like playing this chess stuff, then?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I don't. The chesses are extremely boring.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Here I thought you were a board game maniac. You know, those types who only stop to eat and then keep on playing.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Both sides of a board follow the same rules, black and white doing death unto each other along crossing lines. What's the meaning in it?
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Pieces, in the end, are just a method of playing games.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: So why fetch me?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A fight of I against I is far too boring.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Wh-Where... Were we not just at the mountain's foot...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Only they would be capable of this sort of thing.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Miss Ning, follow me closely, please.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: There seems to be... a bright light in the room ahead.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Really, now, starting the game without even explaining the rules.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What about you all?
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: You'd really put me on the spot, asking me to play this stuff...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I only know general strategy.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: No rush, no rush.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: I've waited... a great many years for this match.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Now, what exactly is beating a layman like me going to do for you?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You should wait for your helper.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Lee? Why are you...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Liang Xun?! Er, and Miss Ning...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I've met you before, Assistant Minister Ning.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: There is much I wish to ask of the Candleholders, but now seems not to be not the time.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: (Assistant Minister?!)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Sit, sit.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: With this, it's more or less set.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: What do you intend on doing?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Having a game of weiqi with you all.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: You don't like weiqi, but you'd yank all these people in just to play with you?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I suppose.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: That goblet of yours has done me some serious damage.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: If that lady hadn't finally exposed the truth... how on Terra would I have ended up?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Uncertain. Perhaps at some waking, you would find yourself to be the illusory dream instead. The bubble pops, and the one who opens his eyes, is me.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Now that's just plain terrifying.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Terrifying, indeed.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You don't seem to feel any way about it.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Really, I said it was terrifying.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Heh... I'll leave it at that, then.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Both of you may think it was random chance, that Liang Xun should choose to involve you in this.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: But unfortunately, though it's true there is countless coincidence in this world, for this, you are the sole exception.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: There is a man by the name of Huai.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Your expression changes. It seems you only let out that mote of superfluous seriousness when your friends are mentioned.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Come. It's your turn.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: I must warn you.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: One mindless move, and the whole game is lost.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Lee.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Be calm.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: How did you escape, sir?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I thought for a long, long, long time, and realized one way. That's all.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: A ko fight. How will you respond to this calamity?
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: This game...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: In the game of weiqi, few can surpass you, sir, is that not so?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I've simply lived for a while. Any longer and it'd be boring.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Miss Ning, what say you to this one?
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Don't overthink it.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Clack.
A white stone hits the board.
The outcome is clearly in sight.
I've been too recklessly about, these past few days.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's not your fault.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What does this match signify?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's only a game. Don't overthink it.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: It's very hard not to.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Think about who wins and loses first. Your turn.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: The state of things is evident to all at this point. You don't need to carry on mystifying them.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: So you want to concede. What about the others?
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: I imagine—the meaning of this game isn't on the board at all.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Clack.
Hmm...
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: It's only right that our win or loss shouldn't be determined in this corner.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: The best tactic, with people who love to confuse things, is to play just as mad along with them.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm not good at any kind of chess, but I am good... at reading people.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'll answer the question you just posed, young Candleholder.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: There was an accident previously. I lost a... younger sister. You may be young, but as the responsibility lies with you, I'm sure you can understand what I'm saying.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: This isn't a topic you can discuss here.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: That is true. Please speak, sir, with caution.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: After that, my tiny little residence's piece basket was less one black stone.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: It was merely... broken, in that accident.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: And after that, I thought and thought. About what I should do, and what I even could do.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: The current Grand Tutor... The first time I saw him, he was but a deprived student, led by that teacher of prestige past the stagnant city, gazing towards that towering estate wall...
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: You have no freedom of movement. You shouldn't have seen the Grand Tutor before.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: He's an intriguing one. He said something that lodged deep within my heart, at a time when I'd gotten sick of these stone-cold counters.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: You seem very boresome.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: To the point of stiffness.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Behind Lee, at this moment, are many people.
Friends, companions, high officials just met, and adversaries for the time being.
But Lee still can't see the person before him clearly. This person who appears as a false image of himself.
His features are indistinct.
So indistinct it puts shivers down the spine.
One more move, and even if I somehow understood less about board games, I'd still be able to tell it was your win long ago.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: If you and I agreed to identical rules, what victory or loss could lie on the board?
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Well, that's some sophistry. You need to apologize to every grandmaster in all the realm.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So be it. All in all, I've enjoyed my days carried at your side very much.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: This match is your win.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: It seems we haven't quite finished playing.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I simply underestimated my... little sisters.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Our match has no real meaning. Call this my surrender.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: I thought you'd be the type who never likes losing.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hm? Ah... yes, I did indeed lose.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: And you, Cautus, name of Kroos.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Nian has an ulterior motive in choosing Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: I wish you'd used a bit more positivity to describe Nian and our's relationship, ya know.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Mm... no matter. Understand it how you want to.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: You've no way to uninvolve yourselves anymore.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: *Sigh* Should little Dusk catch sight of your squalid garden, I predict she'll be of quite some temper.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You've arrived.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Your tone, to my ears, does not welcome me.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Having so many about you to keep you company with game and talk? What could it be? Have you been too lonely?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You saw through that mirage. If so, Nian and Dusk must not have been able to beat it.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: So you had guessed... Kroos, now allow me past. Let me be closer to my brother.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Uh... alright.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Come to mention it... when'd she ever learn my name?)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You played black. Who played white?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I cast myself as the piece, contested with the common folk, and was restless without victory.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Was Jie's disappearance the cause?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I've surrendered now. You all needn't stay longer. Only, Ling, there's a small present I've sent you that you haven't noticed yet. Once you witness it, come find me again.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Your regard for her...
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Has nothing to do with this.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: I only fault the human realm for being so exceedingly dull.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Let's continue.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: What were you doing while we were stuck inside that strange place?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I wanted to choose a handy staff. I didn't find one.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Unfortunate.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Hey! Are you still about to go at it?! You had so long to rest, and you couldn't cool your tempers one bit?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Lummox! Master Shen! Come, now, give them a piece of your minds!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: A change in the summits. This means what Mr. Liang briefed us about has come true.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Sui-Xiang has manifested. Higher priorities first.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I'd better go up the mountain too.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Then go ahead.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Will you really not listen to what I have to say?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Urgh! What happened up there—
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: —Watch your heads!
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Ugh––!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Stone comes rolling down.
Zheng Qingyue brandishes his blade.
If only twenty years ago—no, ten years ago, he had the self-confidence to cleave apart these boulders as great as his head, not a speck of dust on him.
But he is old now.
Dad! Watch out!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: —Ye, my girl!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: He is old, and his child has grown up.
No thoughts plague Zheng Qingyue. A rock strikes his daughter in the head as she moves to save him, and she falls off the cliffside. Yet without the slightest hesitation, he jumps down after her.
Innkeeper!!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Hey, now, hey! What are you doing—
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: —Why did he jump down along with her—
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Shen Lou!
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Cheh. I'll look below, and you get up there! Don't act without thinking, no matter what you see at the summit!
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I'll go with you!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Ugh... how... Ye! Ye!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Ye!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Thank heaven, she's only unconscious...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: If I wasn't deflecting at the critical moment, you two would have long fallen to your deaths.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: ...Shang Zhong.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Once again, Zheng Qingyue, once again!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Back then, you couldn't protect my son, protect Du Yaoye's father, protect that damned goblet!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You should know the blame you carry. It's still not time for you to bemoan yourself, and you can forget having any right to.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Your arm is hurt, and so is my leg. You and I are even.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Let us continue, before they get in the way again.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: One move will be enough.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: It's so tall. You really never sense it, walking ordinarily on the roads, how steep this peak truly is.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: People should not always walk on the given path.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Your move just now counts as having saved my life.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I saved the child.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Yes, you saved the child too. So how am I going to duel you for life or death now?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Why you!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Come on, then.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Deep in the forest, white snow still rests. The two face each other in silence.
The sound of a zither passes them by, its notes mournful.
Who is it?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Ling does not speak. She simply, quietly, sits cross-legged, seated upon an ice-cold boulder.
The wind blows aslant in the twilight, the sun about to set beneath.
This pair of enemies faces each other anew.
A zither's single pluck sounds, as if from the heavens. Even so, the girl is not holding one.
*cough* *cough*... Did we... make it out from that weird guy's grasp?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Looks like we're still not out of the woods yet.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Getting blackmailed by myself really isn't a happy experience...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Lord Zuo.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Uncle Taihe.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I met the offender.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But if we truly take him at his word, then the three face their own self-shackles at this moment.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You have misgivings.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I just don't understand why the Grand Tutor would trust that offender.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: If they fail, we'll be confronting their reflection here in Shangshu. Even if... it's only a small fraction.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Sui Regulator was planning to pressure Tianshi Bai into action with this.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: That's what my father hopes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The sky!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The shadows are taking form... Is this... Sui's reflection?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Ministry of Rites has Bluethunder Count Bai Dingshan in Shangshu overseeing a team. This is only the Sui-Xiang shadow. It won't make waves.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: What is it... looking at?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Zuo Le suddenly senses that Sui-Xiang is examining this land closely.
Now longing, now grieving, now merciful.
And once a breeze blows past, the massive shadow, in the blink of an eye, vanishes like smoke.
What! It disappeared?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: From a farcical dream, it awoke, and so disappeared.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: How did you...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Ling.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You could do things... like this, all along?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: We were there thinking of every way we could possibly save our own existential skins, and you could've just clapped your hands and broken that illusion up?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Our lives are but a fantasy, like a dewdrop or lightning, leaving not a trace in the end.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Scarcely known was it if you, I, or It, like the shadow's shadow and its shade, seem to be yet turn out not.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: So, may the one who comes to nothing and is shattered not be It?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You say that real lightly.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It is but a lightest thing.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: And that is why I am your big sister, after all.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The Sui Regulator demands Nian and Dusk give an explanation.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Additionally, the three of you cannot act in concert. You must leave Shangshu under the Sui Regulator's supervision.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What? Can't we just have a family reunion at Rhodes Island instead?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I still wanted to pull a couple more in.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: (Wait... are you serious?)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: If Rhodes Island intends to attract even more scrutiny...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: If you believe what I say, then maybe you ought to come see for yourself.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*—
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: That's, uh... Well, considering this whole...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I will provide assurance.
Lin Qingyan.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Leizi!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Long haven't we met, Kroos.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: Is that a new operator by your side?
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: I-I am the humble Nothing. Well met, Miss Leizi.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: I thought the Central Judicial Office was unwilling to interfere in the Sui Regulator's affairs.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: As a disciple of the Tianshi Bureaus, I simply exhorted my Master's good friend Master Taihe to allow all some leeway on this matter.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: No wonder Miss Ning always held her fire... You persuaded Tianshi Bai beforehand.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But at what moment can the Tianshis take charge of this matter?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Naturally, they can't.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: But at this juncture, the Sui Regulator may not be allowed to throw down decisions either.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Grand Tutor has arrived in Shangshu.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: Sui Regulator Candleholder Zuo Le, Assistant Minister of Rites Ning Ciqiu, Department of Discipline and Supervision Deputy Monitir Censor Taihe, Shangshu Magistrate Liang Xun, and I myself, must all return to the Liang estate before the Hour of Tzu.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: We will await the Grand Tutor's orders.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: As you command.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Nian, Dusk, Ling.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: The three of you to the Liang estate too, please. The Grand Tutor wants to see you for himself.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: Quite good.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Some thirty years and more passed since last I met him. How much he could have changed from then to now.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Alright, here we go again...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You are awake.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: A daydream.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You and I know well this was their strategy.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: That game of weiqi...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: All in all, it was by a fluke we didn't lose.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: It was but the combined power of all present, facing a lone person over a game of weiqi. No great brilliance to it in the end.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Brilliance...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Doing battle with him, what do brilliance and disgrace matter?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: —Ye, my girl!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: ...*cough*... You're still fighting in this sorry state?!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Ye! You're hurt worse than we are! Don't be brave!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Zheng Qingyue!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Why did you... stow your blade at the last moment? If you didn't, would a hurt little girl be able to hold you back?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You want to run? I humiliate you and you have your peace of mind, is that it?!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I'm the same.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Ye, you've grown up.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You've grown up...
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: The zither ceases.
Ling's figure scatters into the air, like music about the beams. This is no beautiful dream. 'A small present,' he called it.
Now she has a question; a question she wants an answer to.
